Articles.Content:
Today marks the opening of a subdivision of the BluPlanet Association. Our defense program is built upon a principle of keeping our mother planet safe...both from kermmunists and extrakerbin life forms such as the feared Kraken. It is starting out small, with a tight budget from the main association, but the BluPlanet Defense Division doesn't get held back that easily!

We present our interceptor, designed for easy orbital insertions and swift rendezvous with an enemy spaceship. 1-3 fires the torpedoes.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/84k5efj2s5a9uld/Space%20Torpedo%20Interceptor.craft

With the interceptor complete, our scientists have also released an escort vehicle. Designed to accompany ships such as fuel tankers. 1-2 fires the torpedoes.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/n4zscn1qhsr30za/Armed%20Escort.craft

New from the BluPlanet Defense, the AeroVenture Bomber. A modified AeroVenture B with a series of structural bombs attached, which are dropped with keys 1-4.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/4s3kncrwdneox5w/AeroVenture%20B%20Armed.craft

BluPlanet engineers have released a prototype rover that features an armament of rocket missiles. Action group 1 launches the JEB Missile and 2-7 fires the small ones. Due to rushed engineering, these missiles lack accuracy, but they say its good for distracting the enemy...

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/a78g27adl1b0jv7/Rocket%20Rover.craft

Under the supervision of rover builder lordhullo, the defense division have created the Rhino, a customizable, armored tank.

Press 1 to invert steering (for accurate driving), and 2-5 to fire the example weapon. You can of course attach whatever you wish to this multipurpose tank.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/hmlddn0t7sjnvxr/Rhino.craft

Made by ace of spades, the "ICBM" 1. Yes, it isn't actually an ICBM BUT it allows you to blow up your worst enemy ever(bill). It features 6 missiles atop a rover, which can either be fired in pairs with 1,2, and 3, or released all at once with spacebar.

Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/3zrl8lvok4cgrw4/Rover%20ICBM-1.craft

Heracles Battlecruiser, a failed project: https://www.dropbox.com/s/at68r7krx4a0m0g/Heracles%20Battlecruiser.craft

More info: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39056-Heracles-Battlecruiser-A-hero-who-became-scrap-metal?p=499362#post499362

Hades Battlecruiser, hull by lordhullo. Download: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2iume7pmm0t5bnq/The%20Hades.craft

More info: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/39269-Hades-Battlecruiser-Heracles-successor-(BP-Inc)?p=502251#post502251

Edited July 6, 2013 by Kerbol Prime

UPDATE: The BluPlanet administration has decided there was also a need for surface defense. Although the name states "orbital defense" it has been declared our scientists will also develop planes and rovers to ensure the safety of our association.
